data.title: Pittsburgh Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: "They give me chills!" is a common response when asked about the band Angel Blue Band. A Talented Electrifying, Fun, Exciting,  Original and Soulful Rock, Blues and R&B Band hailing from Pittsburgh Pennsylvania. Angel Blue Band (Angel Blue and the Prophets) has combined musical history of over 150 years! Influenced by the greats in rock soul & blues such as: Janis Joplin, Jimi Hendrix, Susan Tedeschi, Etta James, Eric Clapton, Aretha Franklin, Aerosmith, Stevie Nicks, Tina Turner, Just to name a few! They have opened for many national acts such as: Johnny Winters, Shannon Curfman, Charlie Daniels Band, Donnie Iris, Indigenous, Dick Dale etc. and have received Standing Ovations as an Opening Act! Please check ITunes and CD Baby for their cd Bottom of the Bottle Blues. A new CD is coming soon!
data.text:
"The Best Band I've ever had at my events" --3 River Harley Davidson Owner

"WOW! Angel's vocals are a knockout! One act you don't want to miss! Got to see her!"--Pittsburgh Post Gazette

"Angel Blue Band was as close to perfect that I have ever seen in bandcompetition. WOW!" --Peter A. Shaw, Judge for Regional Music Competition for 15+ yrs.

2011/2012 Winner of Pittsburghs Best Blues Based Band--Iron City Rocks Radio & Podcast

2012--Winner of Pittsburghs Best Female Vocalist--Iron City Rocks Radio & Podcast

The absolute best female voice around! Soulful, heartbreaking and blow the house down worthy!"--Janyce Lapore, PIttsburgh Screen Writer
